title: Introduction to Next.js
subtitle: Next.js for Front-End Development
description: Discover Next.js, the powerful React framework, in this introductory course. Learn the basics of Next.js development, including setting up the environment, server-side rendering, and static site generation. Gain practical experience building basic applications and exploring styling options. Elevate your front-end development skills with Next.js and unlock the potential of creating dynamic web experiences.
